EmailTemplate.name: User Groups.February 2015 Singapore UG
EmailTemplate.subject: First web night of the year -- Join us Thursday, February 12 @ 7:00pm
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring User Group Join the Singapore Spring User Group for our first web night of the year! We will be talking about Spring MVC, AngularJS and many other cool topics.
Our meetup will happen on Thursday, February 12th, 2015. It is a free event organised by Pivotal. It will kindly be hosted by Paypal in Suntec. As usual, it will be a great opportunity to meet some fellow passionate developers and learn about new topics.
You can register on our meetup group here: http://www.meetup.com/singasug/ Singapore February 12, 2015 7:00pm-9:00pm (Singapore, Singapore) Register <http://www.meetup.com/singasug/>
